suggestions: Specify how community concerns will be addressed, including any mechanisms for feedback or dispute resolution.
Include specific roles and responsibilities of stakeholders involved in the community engagement process.
Clarify the criteria for evaluating economic impacts.
Detail the specific actions the City Council will undertake to ensure compliance with legal requirements.
Establish a clear timeline for the steps involved in the process beyond just the November deadline.

issues: Potential community opposition to the ordinance.
Legal challenges that may arise during the approval process.
Timeline constraints related to public hearings and feedback incorporation.
input.original_headline: Will the city council vote to approve the downtown redevelopment ordinance by november 30?

sections.title: Purpose
sections.content: The purpose of this contract is to outline the procedures for community engagement regarding the downtown redevelopment ordinance. It aims to ensure that community concerns are identified, addressed, and incorporated into the planning process. Mechanisms for feedback and dispute resolution will be established to facilitate open communication between stakeholders and the City Council.

sections.title: Scope
sections.content: This contract covers the roles and responsibilities of all stakeholders involved in the community engagement process. This includes the City Council, community organizations, and residents. It also specifies the criteria for evaluating the economic impacts of the redevelopment, ensuring transparency and accountability in the assessment process.

sections.title: Terms
sections.content: The City Council will undertake specific actions to ensure compliance with all legal requirements during the redevelopment process. A clear timeline will be established for each step involved, beyond the November deadline, including public hearings, community feedback collection, and the integration of feedback into the ordinance. This timeline will help manage expectations and enhance community trust.

issues: Potential community opposition to the ordinance.
Legal challenges that may arise during the approval process.
Timeline constraints related to public hearings and feedback incorporation.
